about_the_game:
👻🌛 It’s all back to haunt you this Halloween… 

🔮 Those terrible card plays you made… The Madame Beatrice outfit lets you see them all!* 

🍲 Those healthy meals you prepped and then abandoned in the fridge… Watch them crawl out like the Cauldron Creature outfit!**

🕯️ Those opponents you exploded… Guide their souls with the Mystic Mayhem emoji pack!

🌚 Make yourself look all mysterious with the Mystic Mayhem card back!

🃏 Gather at the new location, Madame Beatrice’s House, and cringe at the horrors of the past…

(*The Madame Beatrice outfit cannot, in fact, see anything additional.)

INCLUDES: 

  • TWO NEW OUTFITS — Foresee horrors with the Madame Beatrice outfit, and become those horrors with the Cauldron Creature outfit! 

  • MYSTIC MAYHEM EMOJI PACK — These candles give a whole new meaning to “sick burn”. 

  • NEW CARD BACK AND LOCATION — Oh hey, we made it through the entire Steam Store description without using the phrase “scaredy cat”! 

Face your fears and grab the Mystic Mayhem pack now!

name: Exploding Kittens® 2 - Mystic Mayhem Pack

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Exploding Kittens® 2 - Mystic Mayhem Pack

short_description: We have a message from the other side for all our spooky Furballs… The mysterious Madame Beatrice predicts that you will explode in the first round! Tremble in fear and await the Mystic Mayhem Pack – haunting Exploding Kittens® 2 soon!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain
